page.title: 12A Typical Friday
page.content: It is Friday morning 7 a.m. I jump out of bed and wash and dress.I have breakfast and do my packlunch.I run outside and climb the nearest tree.I collect my schoolbag and walk to school.I go into the school building and line up for assembly.In assembly we sing a hymn and our headmaster talks to us.Then our teacher takes us for English.English lasts until 10.30 a.m.After breaktime we have one hour of maths.After maths we have our dinner break.After dinner we do some artwork.At half-past three we go home.I hammer on my door.Mum lets me in.I change into my jogging suit and jog down to my grans.I have tea and watch Tarzan.Then I go to guides until 9 p.m.Then I do my knitting till bedtime,9.30 p.m.I also like Fridays because I can have a lie_in on Saturdays.
